pieSizes.name: Small Pie
pieSizes.description: Enough to feed your dog, or a small person.

pieSizes.name: Medium Pie
pieSizes.description: About the size of your hand, if you had really big hands.

pieSizes.name: Large Pie
pieSizes.description: Large and in charge, this pie will leave you sleepy and satisfied.

pieSizes.name: Colossal Pie
pieSizes.description: Giant-sized, for when your hunger cannot be tamed by a Large.
